DataElement.preferredName: Malignant Pleural Effusion Malignant Pericardial Effusion Present Ind-2
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator whether a collection of fluid in the pleural cavity as a result of malignant disease or a collection of fluid in the pericardial space as a complication of malignant disease is present at a specified time.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Malignant Pleural Effusion Malignant Pericardial Effusion Present
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to a collection of fluid in the pleural cavity as a result of malignant disease or a collection of fluid in the pericardial space as a complication of malignant disease being present at a specified time.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Malignant Pleural Effusion Malignant Pericardial Effusion
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A collection of fluid in the pleural cavity as a result of malignant disease. Malignant pleural effusion fluid often contains free-floating malignant cells. --2004:Presence of fluid in the pericardial space as a complication of malignant disease.

Concepts.definition: A collection of fluid in the pleural cavity resulting from malignant disease. Malignant pleural effusions often contain free-floating malignant cells.
Presence of fluid in the pericardial space as a complication of malignant disease.

Property.preferredDefinition: Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

Concepts.definition: Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: indication of the presence and extent of disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: If M1a, was this staging due to pericardial/pleural effusion only

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Known pleural or pericardial effusion of any grade

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Exudative, bloody, or cytologically malignant effusions?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have symptomatic effusions (pleural, pericardial, or peritoneal) and/or has required a procedure for symptomatic effusions within 4 weeks of start of dasatinib?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: If a pleural effusion is present, were all of the criteria from section 3.1 met?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 01
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have moderate or large pericardial effusion?
